articles.title: OpenAI Anchors First Brand Campaign In Humanity, With A Little Help From ChatGPT
articles.summary: OpenAI launched a new brand campaign, shot on 35mm film, in the US and UK. The campaign showcases different characters using ChatGPT for various activities like cooking, learning, and travel. It demonstrates the integration of AI into everyday life through the capabilities of ChatGPT.

articles.title: National Beverage Corp. (FIZZ) Posts Record Q1 2026 Sales of $331M, EPS $0.60 Amid Margin Pressures
articles.author: Laiba Immad
articles.summary: National Beverage Corp., maker of LaCroix, launched four new LaCroix flavors and the 'Deliciously Magical' variety pack, which supported strong organic growth. Despite a stock downturn and revenue falling short of analyst expectations, the company's innovation and cash flow position it for potential recovery.

articles.title: 40 Useful Things To Help You Get Through Your To-Do List In A Flash
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Veet introduces a sensitive hair removal gel featuring an aloe-infused formula for gentle hair removal in under 10 minutes. Hanni launched the Shave Pillow, a showerless shave gel formulated with cactus water and glycerin. Dawn unveiled Powerwash, a spray-on dish soap for tough cleaning tasks on various surfaces.

articles.title: 13 Items From Walmart's New Bettergoods Brand That Are Worth Buying
articles.author: Andy Beth Miller
articles.summary: Walmart launched its new private label brand, Bettergoods, introducing a range of new food products. The brand includes items like Garlic Butter Dry Rub Wings, Beef Bulgogi Empanadas, Italian Wood-Fired Mushroom and Truffle Pizza, Hot Honey Chicken and Waffle Sandwich, Hatch Chile Tortilla Chips, Pistachio Salted Caramel Ice Cream, Assorted French Macarons, Tamarind and Chili Pineapple Gummy Rings, Oatmilk Frozen Desserts, Black Truffle Butter, Mushroom Umami Seasoning, Extra Creamy Oatmilk, and Organic Jalapeño Limeade.

articles.title: Bengaluru: New BMTC bus services from today
articles.author: DHNS
articles.summary: A company introduced new bus services. These services are now available.

articles.title: 'I'm an American in the UK - this 1 Sainsbury's find is incredible'
articles.author: Christine Younan
articles.summary: Sainsbury's is offering 'Cantina del Sabor, Cali Street' masa tortillas, a product that an American customer was excited to find. The tortillas come in a 15-taco pack priced at £1.75 and are recommended to be warmed in oil before serving.

articles.title: 24 Products That'll Bring So Much Joy For So Little Money
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: E.l.f. introduces a shea butter-infused cream-to-powder multistick for blush, lipstick, and eyeshadow. Orly launches Bonder base coat to improve the longevity of manicures. A new Anti-soggy cereal bowl solves the problem of soggy cereal.

articles.title: Shoppers 'feel a difference' after using anti-hair loss set - and it's on sale
articles.author: Alice Rush
articles.summary: LookFantastic has launched an exclusive Nioxin Anti-Hair Loss Bestsellers Bundle, which includes a scalp brush, anti-hair loss shampoo, and strengthening mask designed to nourish the scalp and promote hair growth. The bundle is available at 18% off for €63.95. We Are Paradoxx Growth Thickening Shampoo is also available for €20.95 as an alternative option for consumers.

articles.title: DraftKings Promo Code: Claim $200 Bonus on Any NFL Week 4 Game
articles.author: Wtop
articles.summary: DraftKings offers a welcome offer to all new users. This promotion may constitute a service update aimed at attracting new customers.

articles.title: UK's Best Beauty Advent Calendars 2025
articles.author: Stephanie Soteriou
articles.summary: Numerous companies such as Real Techniques, Revolution Beauty, Cath Kidston, Baylis & Harding, Soap and Glory, No7, Marks & Spencer, Boots, Liz Earle, The Beauty Crop, Next Beauty, ASOS, Avant Skincare, LookFantastic, NUXE, The Body Shop, Benefit, Rituals, Debenhams, Charlotte Tilbury, M.A.C, Lush, Molton Brown, Sephora Favorites, Cult Beauty, Bamford, Vogue and Diptyque launch or update their advent calendars for the 2025 holiday season. These calendars include a variety of products ranging from makeup and skincare to body care, fragrances, and lifestyle items, offering a wide selection for different customer preferences.

articles.title: OpenAI's first major brand campaign wants to win your heart and mind
articles.author: Jeff Beer
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched a new advertising campaign highlighting the diverse applications of ChatGPT. The campaign showcases ChatGPT's ability to provide recipes, exercise tips, and road trip planning assistance, demonstrating its utility in everyday life. This initiative marks a significant step in OpenAI's efforts to attract users amid increasing competition in the AI sector.

articles.title: 'Fun' and seasonal decor from Next will keep a room cosy, shoppers say
articles.author: Alice Rush
articles.summary: Next.ie is offering a variety of draught excluders, including the Neutral Borg 3D Pumpkin Draught Excluder for €31. Shoppers are also praising the Catherine Lansfield Velvet Double Sided Draught Excluder, available in grey and black for €17.50, for its effectiveness and ease of use.

articles.title: 28 Products With Results That Are So Enthralling, You'll Feel Like You've Been Missing Out
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Nivea introduces a lightweight gel cream enriched with Q10. Good Molecules launches Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel to reduce swelling and puffiness. Miss Mouth's presents Messy Eater Stain Treater Spray for stain removal. Gold Bond unveils firming neck and chest cream, loaded with aloe and salicylic acid. Wet & Forget releases an exterior spray to eliminate mold, mildew, moss, and algae. Mise En Scene offers hair serum made with nourishing oils. Mielle's launches Rosemary Mint strengthening oil with biotin. Sol de Janerio introduces Brazilian Bum Bum body cream featuring guarana extract. Truremedy Naturals presents Remedy Tea Tree Oil Body Wash made with aloe, mint, and tea tree soap.

articles.title: You haven't heard of VIDAA yet, but this TV tech could change everything
articles.author: Chris Hachey
articles.summary: VIDAA, in partnership with Deutsche Telekom and Hisense, is launching the first True Operator Smart TV, integrating content and eliminating the need for set-top boxes and extra cables. Ventura OS is also set to be introduced with an intuitive menu, targeted ads, and unified subscription management.

articles.title: 12 Things That Delighted Us Last Week: From Scootcases to Landlines
articles.author: The Editors
articles.summary: Misen launched a new carbon nonstick skillet. Tin Can is offering kid-friendly landlines that are currently available for preorder. New Balance has partnered with Ganni to release new sneaker-loafers with a snake-print upper and patent straps.

articles.title: Future of software creation lies not in lines of code, but in natural language
articles.author: Khaleej Times Staff
articles.summary: Emergent, an AI-powered no-code platform, enables small businesses and entrepreneurs to create functional software applications without writing code, significantly reducing costs. With recent funding, Emergent plans to expand its global presence, invest in R&D, and target markets like the UAE, focusing on making software development accessible to a broader audience.

articles.title: ChatGPT Pulse: AI Breakthroughs
articles.author: Hub Site 365
articles.summary: Microsoft launched AI models, Azure AI, and Azure OpenAI Service, alongside Copilot, driving adoption. The company also relaunched Microsoft Marketplace, featuring a new AI category designed to improve discoverability and co-selling opportunities for AI apps and agents.

articles.title: I spent three months with Telly, the free TV that's always showing ads
articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.summary: Telly is offering a free TV in exchange for displaying ads on a secondary 10-inch display. The TV features a 4K HDR display, a six-driver soundbar, customizable RGB backlighting, a built-in camera with a privacy shutter, and preloaded apps like Spotify and Zoom. Telly runs a custom version of Android and uses the secondary display for news, ads, and widgets.

articles.title: American in the UK visits Sainsbury's for food shop and is left surprised by one item
articles.author: Christine Younan
articles.summary: An American visitor found 'Cantina del Sabor, Cali Street' masa tortillas at Sainsbury's in the UK. The visitor pivoted dinner plans to make tacos using the tortillas, which were found to smell and taste good. A 15 taco pack of the tortillas is sold for £1.75 at Sainsbury's.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 8 features crease-free display technology and Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: Samsung is developing the Galaxy Z Fold 8, incorporating a crease-free display system and the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. The phone also features an upgraded camera system, larger display dimensions, and enhanced third-party application support. Samsung positions the Galaxy Z Fold 8 as a premium option within the expanding foldable smartphone category.

articles.title: More than creepy, Elon Musk's AI girlfriends mark the beginning of the end
articles.author: Sydney Morning Herald
articles.summary: A new companion bot is introduced, offering a compliant, seductive, and gorgeous experience. This product aims to provide an alternative to human companionship.

articles.title: Yocan Unveils the Iris: A Sleek, Powerful Vaporizer for the Modern User
articles.author: Yocan Technology Co.
articles.summary: Yocan has launched its latest vaping device, the Yocan Iris, designed for performance and style. The Iris features an OLED display, adjustable voltage control, dual modes (Auto & On-Demand), and a QTZ coil for efficient concentrate use. It also comes in six colors and includes a Head Shop Pioneer Program to support local retailers.

articles.title: Samsung Begins Official Rollout of One UI 8 to Galaxy Devices
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. has launched One UI 8. The new service introduces advanced multimodal AI capabilities and provides a UX optimized for different device form factors.

articles.title: Washing machines will stay mould free and won't smell if you stop using 1 common product
articles.author: Kris Boratyn
articles.summary: Whirlpool introduced the FreshFlow system in their washing machines, utilizing a fan to dry the drum after washes to reduce moisture. GE has also introduced its UltraFresh technology, which brings in fresh air and uses special materials to limit bacteria.

articles.title: Mountain Dew announces new Dirty Cream Soda Dew flavor: Here's when it is expected to hit US shelves
articles.author: Ht Us Desk
articles.summary: PepsiCo is launching 'Dirty Mountain Dew Cream Soda Dew,' a new Mountain Dew flavor that combines citrus with a cream soda twist. It will be available in regular and Zero Sugar versions, debuting at NACS in October 2025 and launching nationwide in early 2026. This launch is a response to the increasing popularity of the 'dirty soda' trend.

articles.title: Xiaomi 17 Pro Max: Chinese giant eyes bigger market share
articles.author: Khaleejtimes
articles.summary: Xiaomi has globally launched its new 15T series smartphones, positioned as affordable flagships. Additionally, Xiaomi introduced a range of smart home appliances under its Mijia brand.

articles.title: Modi's Mann ki Baat: Swadeshi push, Khadi appeal, centenary of RSS & remembrance of Zubeen Garg
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Khadi is urging consumers to purchase at least one Khadi product. This promotion encourages consumers to support Swadeshi.

articles.title: American in the UK visits Sainsbury's for food shop and spots unexpected item
articles.author: Christine Younan
articles.summary: Sainsbury's is now selling 'Cantina del Sabor, Cali Street' masa tortillas, a 15 taco pack for £1.75. An American customer discovered them and was excited to find them in the UK, recommending them for making tacos.

articles.title: 27 Problem-Solving Products
articles.author: Karly Jacklin
articles.summary: Lumify Eye Drops are introduced as a solution for reducing eye redness instantly and are praised for their effectiveness.  Additionally, Debrox earwax removal kit is presented as a safer alternative to cotton swabs, promising a gentler ear cleaning experience.  Elizabeth Mott eye primer is introduced to keep eyeshadow right where it is supposed to be, preventing eyeshadow from hiding in eyelid creases, not running down your cheek...on your eyelids.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 reaches record-low price of $1,599.99 with free storage upgrade
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a foldable smartphone featuring a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite processor and a Dynamic LTPO AMOLED 2X display. Currently, Samsung offers a promotional price of $1,599.99, including a free upgrade to 512GB storage, available on Samsung's official website.

articles.title: Mountain Dew all set to launch new Dirty Cream Soda flavor with creamy twist on classic. All you need to know
articles.author: Lm Us Desk
articles.summary: Mountain Dew, a brand of PepsiCo, is launching Dirty Mountain Dew Cream Soda in both regular and Zero Sugar versions. This new flavor combines Mountain Dew's signature citrus taste with a mellow cream soda finish and is aimed to respond to consumer demand and the rising 'dirty soda' trend. The new soda flavour will first be released at the National Association of Convenience Stores (NACS) in October 2025, with a potential national rollout in 2026.

articles.title: 30 Fast-Acting Products That Might Actually Be Magic
articles.author: Taylor Steele
articles.summary: Several companies are launching or promoting cleaning, personal care, and home products. Gold Bond introduces a skin-firming neck and chest cream, while Bounce offers an anti-static wrinkle-release spray.  L'Oréal features an eight-second lamellar rinse-out treatment, EcoTools provides a makeup brush cleaning spray, and Glisten offers garbage disposal cleaner.

articles.title: I travel for a living and always pack this cheap item for holidays – it's a lifesaver and takes up very little room
articles.author: Cyann Fielding
articles.summary: Homeasy Clothes Steamer, G6 Clothes Steamer, and Philips 3000 Series Handheld Steamer are introduced as compact, travel-friendly solutions for removing wrinkles from clothes. Additionally, John Lewis' Handheld & Foldable Desk Fan is presented as a portable cooling device with multiple speed settings and a rechargeable battery.

articles.title: 'I bought an Advent Calendar with strange twist and was left gobsmacked when I opened it'
articles.author: Danielle Kate Wroe
articles.summary: Lush has launched a Halloween Countdown Advent Calendar containing seven different products. The calendar includes items like The Alchemist Bath Bomb, Palm Reader Naked Hand Cream, Bewitched Bubble Bar, Demon In The Dark Soap, Skeleton Monster-Mash Head, Pumpkin Spice Latte Shower Gel and Ghostie Bath Bomb, each offering unique scents and experiences. The total cost of the individual items is £45.50, but the calendar is priced higher to account for the packaging and overall experience.

articles.title: 31 Totally Responsible Purchases That'll Make You Feel Exceptionally 'Adult'
articles.summary: Sure Petcare launched a Wi-Fi-enabled version of their microchip pet feeder, which connects to the Sure Petcare app. This new version offers features like monitoring eating habits and weighing food portions. The microchip pet feeders help to control each pet's calorie intake, thus, allowing to monitor and maintain their health.

articles.title: Buldak instant noodles top 8 bil. in global sales
articles.author: Korea Times
articles.summary: Samyang Foods' Buldak instant noodles series has achieved over 8 billion units in cumulative sales since its launch in 2012. The spicy noodles gained popularity due to their unique flavor and viral eating challenge.

articles.title: Affordable All-in-One: Amazon's $63 Laptop-Tablet Fusion Combines Speed and Ease of Use
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Amazon has launched a new all-in-one device priced at $63, aiming to bridge the gap between tablets and entry-level laptops. The device features an ARM Cortex-A53 quad-core processor, 2GB of RAM, 32GB of storage, a 10.1-inch IPS display, and runs a streamlined version of Android. An optional detachable keyboard is available, transforming the tablet into a functional laptop.

articles.title: 43 Products You Won't Just "Normal" Like, You'll *Reallllllllyyyy* Like
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: The content showcases a variety of newly introduced or popular products from various companies. Examples include Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Bum Bum Cream that hydrates skin, Java Sock which keeps the drink cold, SweatBlock antiperspirant wipes that lasts for seven days and Denman Hair Brush specially designed for detangling curls. There's also a mention of Skims version, Liquid I.V. Hydration packets, Tineco 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop, Bissell multipurpose carpet and upholstery cleaner, etc.

articles.title: Three Traditional Marketing Strategies That Help Build Customer Trust
articles.author: Alison Coleman
articles.summary: Louisa Macari, founder of haircare startup She's Thick, launched a pre-shampoo treatment designed to strengthen and protect chemically lightened hair. Macari is using face-to-face interaction in retail stores to introduce the brand and engage with potential customers. Since implementing this strategy sales of the product has increased by 160%.

articles.title: 31 Travel Items That'll Make Checking A Bag Worth It
articles.author: Chelsea Stuart
articles.summary: The article highlights various travel-related products. Nori introduces a compact travel iron and steamer. Hoka offers Clifton 10s and Nortiv 8 introduces walking shoes, while Thesus Weekend Boots cater to adventure travelers. Athleta presents Jetset Bomber, and Tushbaby offers a carrier seen on Shark Tank.

articles.title: The new Dyson V8 Cyclone cordless vac fixes everything that annoyed me about the original V8!
articles.author: Rachael Sharpe
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the upgraded V8 Cyclone cordless vacuum, priced at £350 (US pricing to be announced). The V8 Cyclone addresses issues of the original V8 with features like a triggerless power button, longer run-time of sixty minutes with an option for a hot-swappable battery, 30% more suction power, and a motorbar cleaner head.

articles.title: Amazon may make your Kindle and Echo speaker look massively outdated this week
articles.author: David Snelling
articles.summary: Amazon is preparing to launch new products, including a new Echo speaker, a color Kindle, and a Fire TV. The company is also speculated to introduce a color screen to its premium Scribe device, representing a possible update to the existing Kindle.

articles.title: Microsoft Confirms Windows Offer—Save $30 With One Click
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: A new offer is now available to more than 600 million Windows users. This suggests a broad rollout of a new product or service within the Windows ecosystem.

articles.title: 'This handheld steamer has been a lifesaver for erasing creases in shirts within minutes'
articles.author: Meghan Coon
articles.summary: Philips has launched the Series 5000 Handheld Steamer, designed for quick wrinkle removal and ease of use, now available at Amazon and Currys for £59.99. The steamer features adjustable heat settings, a compact design, and comes with two water containers and a heatproof glove. Tefal's Pure Pop Slim Handheld Clothes Steamer is also recommended as a lighter alternative, priced at £39 on Amazon.

articles.title: Review: Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 brings back the compact tablet
articles.author: Daniel Smith
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Tab S11, a compact tablet featuring an 11-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with a 120Hz refresh rate, powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ chipset. It includes Galaxy AI features and an upgraded S Pen and is available from the Samsung website starting at £799.

articles.title: Leonardo DiCaprio : ses 10 films les plus importants
articles.author: Francesca Pellegrini
articles.summary: An apparel company is planning to promote a new line of high-end baby clothes. The company aims to target wealthy parents or couples with a new child by creating profiles and presenting advertising within partner apps.

articles.title: Max: Rear Screens & Snapdragon 8 Elite
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Xiaomi has unveiled the Xiaomi 17 and 17 Pro, featuring rumored specifications comparable to the upcoming iPhone 17, along with a renewed focus on dual-screen technology. The dual-screen is intended to enhance productivity and multitasking, differentiating the product and building Xiaomi's ecosystem.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE launch offers £370 of freebies
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 FE, a new addition to its Galaxy S25 lineup, featuring a 6.7" dynamic AMOLED 2X display, 12MP ultra-wide camera, 50MP wide camera, 256GB of storage, and a 4,900 mAh battery. The S25 FE incorporates Galaxy AI functions and Google's AI-powered Gemini Live, with prices starting at £649 and contract deals available with free Galaxy Watch7 and Galaxy Buds3 FE.

articles.title: Lynked: Banner of the Spark Is a Roguelike That Doesn't Feel Like One (Review)
articles.author: Anthony Franklin II
articles.summary: Lynked: Banner of the Spark, a new game for Nintendo Switch, combines roguelike and Animal Crossing elements, allowing players to rebuild their town using resources gathered in missions. The game features online and offline modes, combat mechanics, and customizable threat levels. Overall, the game provides an engaging gameplay loop.

articles.title: Next's 'beautiful' £36 fleece jacket is perfect for 'cold winter days'
articles.author: mylondonnewsdesk@reachplc.com
articles.summary: Next offers the Threadbare Half Zip Borg Fleece for £36 and the Roll Neck Ribbed Jumper With Wool for £20. Tu sells the Quarter Zip Borg Fleece Jumper at £22.50, while H&M has the Zip-Top Teddy Sweatshirt on offer for £15.30.

articles.title: 19 Splurge-Worthy Korean Skincare Products To Really Step Up Your Routine
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: The article highlights several newly launched skincare products, including Ma:nyo cleansing oil, Glow Recipe Watermelon Glow Niacinamide Dew Drops, Laneige glowy lip balm, Medicube Age-R Booster Pro and Peach & Lily water gel moisturizer. These products range from cleansers and moisturizers to devices, offering diverse benefits such as deep cleansing, hydration, skin rejuvenation, and a dewy complexion.

articles.title: Buldak instant noodles top 8 bil. units in global sales
articles.author: Korea Times
articles.summary: Samyang Foods' Buldak instant noodles series has sold over 8 billion units since its launch in 2012. The spicy noodles gained popularity due to their unique flavor and associated viral eating challenge.

articles.title: 5 tablets for working professionals from top brands like Apple, Samsung and more
articles.author: Boudhaditya Sanyal
articles.summary: The article highlights several new tablets designed for professionals, including the Apple iPad Pro 11" (M4) with its Ultra Retina XDR display, the Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Plus with its Dynamic AMOLED 2X display and S Pen, the OnePlus Pad 3 with its Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, the Lenovo Yoga Tab Plus with its 3K display and pen/keyboard support, and the XIAOMI Pad 7 with its Nano Texture display and Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 processor. Each tablet offers a balance of performance, display quality, and features tailored for productivity and entertainment.

articles.title: Buldak instant noodles top 8 bil. units in global sales
articles.author: Ko Dong-Hwan
articles.summary: Samyang Foods' Buldak instant noodles series has exceeded 8 billion units in cumulative sales since its launch in 2012, becoming a prominent K-food symbol globally. The company is scaling up production at its Miryang plants to meet the surging global demand and aims to grow with consumers through locally tailored products and content collaborations, further expanding its product line into sauces, snacks, and ready-to-eat meals.

articles.title: Buldak instant noodles top 8 bil. in global sales
articles.author: Ko Dong-Hwan
articles.summary: Samyang Foods' Buldak instant noodles series has surpassed 8 billion units in cumulative sales since its launch in 2012. The brand has expanded beyond noodles into sauces, snacks and ready-to-eat meals, exporting its Buldak sauce to over 50 countries.

articles.title: If Your Birth Year Starts With '19,' These 47 'Boring' Products Under $50 Will Probably Excite You
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: SweatBlock is launching antiperspirant wipes. A lightweight gel cream from Nivea is being introduced, with Q10 ingredient. Medicube's "Zero Pore" Pads are launched as a Korean skincare product to exfoliate pores. Qualify is launching chocolate brownie protein powder. Gold Bond is launching firming neck and chest cream. Elizavecca is launching Collagen Coating Hair Protein Treatment. Miss Mouth is launching Messy Eater Stain Treater spray.

articles.title: Xiaomi 17 na iPhone Killer? Wetin Dey Happen!
articles.author: Halimah Adamu
articles.summary: Xiaomi launched its new 17 series on September 25, 2025, including the Xiaomi 17 Pro and Pro Max. The phones feature a 'Dynamic Back Display', Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor, up to 16GB RAM, and a 7,500 mAh battery in the Pro Max model. The series also includes a 50-megapixel trio camera with 5x zoom, with prices starting around ¥4,499 (around $630).

articles.title: AP chief minister Chandrababu Naidu urges youth to focus on indigenous product development
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: BSNL launched its indigenous 4G network. The launch was virtually attended by chief minister N Chandrababu Naidu and launched by Prime Minister Narendra Modi.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 8 features crease-free display technology and Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Samsung is introducing the Galaxy Z Fold 8, featuring a crease-free display developed with FineMtech. The new phone also includes the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset and an enhanced camera system targeting the foldable smartphone market.
